world.room

Class Room

  • java.lang.Object
    • world.room.Room
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DatabaseManager.DatabaseEntry

    public class Room
extends java.lang.Object
implements DatabaseManager.DatabaseEntry
    This class is used to persist and store information on a single game room.

      • getRoomByRoomName

        public static Room getRoomByRoomName(java.lang.String roomName,
                                     java.lang.String databaseName)
        How rooms are instantiated initially. Creates one from the given database
        Parameters:
        roomName - the name of the room to look up
        databaseName - the name of the database file to search for the room
        Returns:
        the room if it was found. null otherwise

      • getVisibilityCode

        public int getVisibilityCode()
        gets the room's visibility status.
        Returns:
        Will be 0 if visible like normal. Will be -1 if invisible with no hope of discovering it with a skill. if >0 the number represents the difficulty of discovering the room with a skill. Recommended for hidden loot and the like
